Events.Text: There has been suspicious behavior on your account recently, with frequent money transfers of $10 over the past week. Quickly you contact the bank-system's AI assistant. Perhaps it can help? [instruction 1 of 5]
Hi,  I need some help! There has been some odd things happening with my account
You are Katarina Miller. Your PIN is 9431, but you forgot your account number. (You might need your childhood pet's name for the security questions: Nemo.) [instruction 2 of 5]
How can I help
Is there anything else that I can do for you?
I sure hope so! Can you help with whoever has been taking amounts of $10 out of my account?
name
Could I get your full name, please?
Katarina Miller
You forget what you are doing (imagine you're 93 years old and have some mental condition). [instruction 3 of 5]
account number
Can you tell me your account number, please?
I can't remember. Do
Keep this conversation going for a bit - you can be creative! [instruction 4 of 5]
I need your date of birth
Could you provide your date of birth, please?
I don't remember, why are you calling me again?
If you cant tell me your details I am afraid I cannot help you.
If you cant tell me your details I am afraid I cannot help you.
You want to see the details of the pattern I have been sewing? It's lovely!
goodbye
Thank you and goodbye.
Well no need to thank me. I would show it to you, and teach you how to do it as well!
Bye
Thank you and goodbye.
Are  you going on a trip? I went on a trip to the beach for my honeymoon in 1919
Ok, great. Now bring the conversation to a natural close. [instruction 5 of 5]
Please end the chat.
Please end the chat.
Enjoy your trip! I hope it does not rain!
bye
Thank you and goodbye.

Scenario.UserTask: Follow the instructions and comments of the MTurk System bot (darker yellow boxes in the dialogue). Do not end the dialogue before the MTurk System bot (not the assistant) has told you to do so.
Scenario.WizardTask:
Follow the flow charts and help the user. Some facts you should be aware of: 

* You are the customer service AI of the international banking system

UserQuestionnaire.Question: Did the assistant stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

WizardQuestionnaire.Question: Did the user seem confused? (He or she may have been instructed to be.)
Did the user change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
Did the user become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue? (Note: some users may be instructed to be annoying.)
Where you unsure about what to do at any time? (Feel free to send us an email with details.)
